Key Match Events: USA had several things going against them
India were shell-shocked at 15 for 2, which soon became 44 for 3 when Rishabh Pant was out
Suryakumar Yadav and Shivam Dube dug in to allay nerves
Arshdeep Singh's career-best has USA hobbling
Post-Match Reflections: India are now through to the Super Eights, but USA are still very much masters of their own fate
Miscellaneous Highlights: This was USA's game to lose
On a day when he did most things right, Saurabh Netravalkar shelled a chance to hand Suryakumar Yadav a vital life
Others: The conditions: Before today, they'd never played at Nassau County Stadium; this was India's fourth game at the venue
Monank Patel, the designated captain, was out injured
Rohit Sharma called correctly and asked USA to bat in seaming conditions
A motley crew with day jobs against cricketing royalty
